blob_id - Variable in class scene.tuio.SceneTuioBlob
The individual blob ID number that is assigned to each Tuio blob.

C

connect() - Method in class scene.tuio.SceneTuioClient
The SceneTuioClient starts listening to TUIO messages on the configured UDP port All received TUIO messages are decoded and the resulting events are broadcasted to all registered SceneTuioListeners

D

disconnect() - Method in class scene.tuio.SceneTuioClient
The SceneTuioClient stops listening to TUIO messages on the configured UDP port

S

Scene - Class in scene.tuio
The Processing wrapper class for the Scene Java Library.
Scene(PApplet) - Constructor for class scene.tuio.Scene
This constructor takes a PApplet argument and creates a client that listens to the default TUIO port 3333.
Scene(PApplet, int) - Constructor for class scene.tuio.Scene
This constructor takes a PApplet argument and creates a client that listens to the provided TUIO port.
scene.tuio - package scene.tuio
 
SceneBlob - Class in scene.tuio
The SceneBlob class encapsulates Scene blobs.
SceneBlob(TuioCursor, SceneTuioBlob) - Constructor for class scene.tuio.SceneBlob
This constructor takes a TuioCursor argument and a SceneTuioBlob argument with ths same sesssion ID, and assigns them to the SceneBlob.
SceneTuioBlob - Class in scene.tuio
The SceneTuioBlob class encapsulates /tuio/2Dblb TUIO blobs.
SceneTuioBlob(TuioTime, long, int, float, float, float, float, float, float) - Constructor for class scene.tuio.SceneTuioBlob
This constructor takes a TuioTime argument and assigns it along with the provided Session ID, Blob ID, X and Y coordinates, angle, width, height and area, and assigns these values to the newly created Tuio blob.
SceneTuioBlob(long, int, float, float, float, float, float, float) - Constructor for class scene.tuio.SceneTuioBlob
This constructor takes the provided Session ID, Blob ID, X and Y coordinates, angle, width, height and area, and assigns these values to the newly created Tuio blob.
SceneTuioBlob(SceneTuioBlob) - Constructor for class scene.tuio.SceneTuioBlob
This constructor takes the attributes of the provided Tuio blob and assigns these values to the newly created SceneTuioBlob.
SceneTuioClient - Class in scene.tuio
The SceneTuioClient class is the central TUIO protocol decoder component.
SceneTuioClient() - Constructor for class scene.tuio.SceneTuioClient
The default constructor creates a client that listens to the default TUIO port 3333
SceneTuioClient(int) - Constructor for class scene.tuio.SceneTuioClient
This constructor creates a client that listens to the provided port
SceneTuioListener - Interface in scene.tuio
The SceneTuioListener interface extends the TuioListener inteface, and provides a simple callback infrastructure which is used by the SceneTuioClient class to dispatch TUIO and Scene events to all registered instances of classes that implement the interface.
session_id - Variable in class scene.tuio.SceneTuioBlob
The unique session ID number that is assigned to each TUIO blob.

stop(TuioTime) - Method in class scene.tuio.SceneTuioBlob
This method is used to calculate the speed and acceleration values of a Tuio blob with unchanged position, angle, width, height and area.
